How to transfer money in three easy steps

Create account

It takes just a few minutes, and all you need is an email address

Enter details

Add recipient (you'll need their address, bank account/IBAN, swift/BTC) and payment information.

Confirm and send

Check the currencies and amount are correct, get the expected delivery date and send your money transfer.
